Package: org.grails.datastore.mapping.engine

[Java] Interface AssociationIndexer<K, T>

  • Responsible for creating indices for associations used in queries. An instance may be specific to a particular association of a particular native instance of an entity (the parent of the association).

    Authors:
    Graeme Rocher
    Since:
    1.0

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        PersistentEntity getIndexedEntity()
        void index(K primaryKey, java.util.List<T> foreignKeys)

        Index a single foreign key

    • Method Detail

      • public PersistentEntity getIndexedEntity()

      • public void index(K primaryKey, java.util.List<T> foreignKeys)

        Creates an index queryable via the primary key. This is called *after* the entity this association indexer is part of has been persisted. Usually, for a particular association type, only this OR preIndex(Object, java.util.List) will be implemented.

        Parameters:
        primaryKey - The primary key
        foreignKeys - The foreign keys

      • public void index(T primaryKey, K foreignKey)

        Index a single foreign key

        Parameters:
        primaryKey - The primaryKey
        foreignKey - The foreignKey

      • public void preIndex(K primaryKey, java.util.List<T> foreignKeys)

        Creates an index queryable via the primary key. This is called *before* the entity that this association indexer is part of is persisted, but after the native entry has been updated ready to be persisted. This allows the index to be placed in the native instance itself, e.g. in a document database. Usually, for a particular association type, only this OR index(Object, java.util.List) will be implemented.

        Parameters:
        primaryKey - The primary key
        foreignKeys - The foreign keys

      • public java.util.List<T> query(K primaryKey)

        Queries the given primary key and returns the foreign keys

        Parameters:
        primaryKey - The primary key
        Returns:
        The foreign keys
